title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Share of global GDP, with a total of 13 data points.
Overall Share of global GDP has increased over the Year.
Share of global GDP is slightly increasing from 2012 to 2024.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2012 and 2013.
Max Share of global GDP about 21.39 was recorded at Year 2024
Min Share of global GDP about 15.26 was recorded at Year 2012
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Share of global GDP with a total of 13 data points. The chart has one significant trend.
This trend is increasing which exists from 2024 to 2012.
